name: Lantern Demo
description:
A small flames journey to explore a long-forgotten cave system

Available for Windows.

This game supports Keyboard + Mouse, Xbox and PlayStation controller.

Lantern is a puzzle platformer where the player has to wield fire to explore a dark cave system long after adventures have plundered its riches and altered its ecosystem.

This demo features :

  • Four playable lanterns: A sturdy standard sized stone lantern, a small nimble stone lantern, a light floating lantern and an extremely messy oil lantern.
  • a variety of burnable and meltable objects
  • 18 colour palettes
  • And an NPC from the future

Enjoy the project so far. This is closer to a vertical slice than an actual level. This game is still in development, so please understand that not all content is final, also if you find any bugs let me know.
